author: susantha
msg: corrected problems in newly generated RPC interop samples

author: tomj
msg: Add a new service level parameter "axis.disableServiceList" which will turn
off the list of services when a GET is performed on the servlet root.
This is already documented in the reference guide I just comitted.

author: tomj
msg: Add a new parameter to the WSDD <service> element:
SoapActionMode="operation|none|default"
This switch parallels the -A option for the command line Java2WSDL.
Add a new attribute to the <operation> element:
soapAction=""
This is used for setting the operations SOAPAction field in generated WSDL.
Other Details:
- ignore case when setting the SOAPAction switch in the Emitter.
- write out new soapAction attribute in deploy.wsdd for WSDL2Java.
- Refactor out the code from JavaSkelWriter that finds the SOAPAction in
to Utils and use it from both the JavaDeployWriter and SkelWriter.
- Attempt to exhaustively documenting all of the WSDD attribute
and parameters so I don't have to keep scrounging through the source code
each time someone asks me how to override stuff.
LETS KEEP THIS UPDATED!

author: susantha
msg: Changed all RPC interop samples to correspond to the code generated by WSDL2Ws tool
